## Academic Appointments

+ 2024-2026. **Research Assistant Professor (Career Track)**, Department of Plant Pathology, Washington State University.
+ 2022-2024. **Postdoctoral Research Associate**, WSU Puyallup Research and Extension Center, Washington State University.
+ 2020-2022. **USDA NIFA Postdoctoral Fellow**, Ornamental Plant Pathology, WSU Puyallup Research and Extension Center, Washington State University.

## Education

+ 2015-2020. **PhD** Plant Pathology, Forestry and Agricultural Biotechnology Institute, Dept. of Plant & Soil Science, University of Pretoria, South Africa. Dissertation: Phytophthora diversity in the Cape Floristic Region. Primary Supervisor: Mike Wingfield. Co-Supervisors: Treena Burgess, Francois Roets.
+ 2016-2019. **Affiliate Research Student**, Dept. of Conservation Ecology & Entomology, Stellenbosch University, South Africa.
+ 2012-2014. **Dual MSc** Dept. of Botany & Plant Pathology, Dept. of Wood Science & Engineering, Oregon State University. Thesis: Phytosanitation of Douglas-fir (Pseudotsuga menziesii) logs to mitigate the risk of disseminating Phytophthora ramorum within the global trade of timber. Advisers: Everett Hansen & Jeff Morrell.
+ 2006-2010. **BSc** Dept. of Natural Resource Sciences, Washington State University. Undergraduate Thesis: Influence of climatic variables on forest growth in the Sierra Nevada Mountains.

## Funding and Support

### Total Funding Requests

```{r, message=FALSE}

funding.summary <- Funding %>% filter(Funding.Type!="In Kind Donations") %>%
  group_by(Funding.Type) %>%
  summarize(
    n = n(),
    n.Funded=sum(Funding.Status == "Funded",na.rm=TRUE),
    Total = sum(Amount, na.rm = TRUE),
    Funded = sum(if_else(Funding.Status == "Funded", Amount, 0), na.rm = TRUE),
    Pending = sum(if_else(Funding.Status == "Pending", Amount, 0), na.rm = TRUE),
    Funded.as.PI = sum(if_else(Funding.Status=="Funded" & Role == "PI", Amount, 0), na.rm = TRUE),
    .groups = "drop"
  ) %>% arrange(desc(Total)) %>%
 bind_rows(
    Funding %>%
      summarize(
        Funding.Type = "Total",
        n = n(),
        n.Funded=sum(Funding.Status == "Funded",na.rm=TRUE),
        Total = sum(Amount, na.rm = TRUE),
        Funded = sum(if_else(Funding.Status == "Funded", Amount, 0), na.rm = TRUE),
        Pending = sum(if_else(Funding.Status == "Pending", Amount, 0), na.rm = TRUE),
        Funded.as.PI = sum(if_else(Funding.Status=="Funded" & Role == "PI", Amount, 0), na.rm = TRUE),
      )
  ) %>% mutate(across(c(Total, Funded, Pending, Funded.as.PI), dollar))

kable(
  funding.summary,
  align=c("l"),
  format = "latex",   # or "html"
  booktabs = TRUE,
 ) %>%
  kable_styling(
    latex_options = c("hold_position"),
    full_width = FALSE,
    position = "left"
  )
```

### Total Funding Awarded

```{r, message=FALSE}

funded <- Funding %>% filter(Funding.Status=="Funded") %>% filter(Funding.Type!="In Kind Donations") %>% 
  group_by(Year.Awarded) %>%
  summarize(
    n = n(),
    Total = sum(Amount, na.rm = TRUE),
    PI = sum(if_else(Role == "PI", Amount, 0), na.rm = TRUE),
    Co.PI = sum(if_else(Role == "Co-PI", Amount, 0), na.rm = TRUE),
    .groups = "drop"
  ) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Year.Awarded)) %>% 
  mutate(Year.Awarded = as.character(Year.Awarded)) %>%
bind_rows(
    summarize(
      .,
      Year.Awarded = "Total",
      across(where(is.numeric), sum)
    )
  ) %>% 
  mutate(across(c(Total,PI,Co.PI), dollar))

kable(
  funded,
  align=c("l"),
  format = "latex",   # or "html"
  booktabs = TRUE,
 ) %>%
  kable_styling(
    latex_options = c("hold_position"),
    full_width = FALSE,
    position = "left"
  )
```

## Presentations

### Summary

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
n_type_by_year <- Presentations %>%
  count(Presentation.Type.Simplified, Year, name = "n") %>%
  pivot_wider(
    names_from  = Year,     # years become columns
    values_from = n,
    values_fill = 0
  ) %>%
  arrange(Presentation.Type.Simplified)

year_cols <- sort(
  as.integer(setdiff(names(n_type_by_year), "Presentation.Type")),
  decreasing = TRUE
)


n_type_by_year <- n_type_by_year %>%
  select(Presentation.Type.Simplified, all_of(as.character(year_cols))) %>%
  arrange(Presentation.Type.Simplified)

total_row <- n_type_by_year %>%
  summarise(
    Presentation.Type.Simplified = "Total in Year",
    across(where(is.numeric), sum)
  )

n_type_by_year <- bind_rows(n_type_by_year, total_row)


kable(
  n_type_by_year,
  col.names = c(
    "Presentation Type",
    names(n_type_by_year)[-1]),
  align = c("l", rep("c", ncol(n_type_by_year) - 1)),
  format = "latex",
  booktabs = TRUE,
  escape = FALSE
) %>%
  kable_styling(
    latex_options = "hold_position",
    full_width = FALSE,
    position = "left"
  ) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "1.1in") %>%                 # Presentation.Type column
  column_spec(2:ncol(n_type_by_year), width = "0.18in")
```

### Summary

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
n_activity_by_year <- Engagement %>%   # <- your table with Engagement Activity / Year / Date / Event
  count(Engagement.Activity, Year, name = "n") %>%
  pivot_wider(
    names_from  = Year,      # years become columns
    values_from = n,
    values_fill = 0
  )

# reorder year columns descending (left â†’ right)
year_cols <- sort(
  as.integer(setdiff(names(n_activity_by_year), "Engagement Activity")),
  decreasing = TRUE
)

n_activity_by_year <- n_activity_by_year %>%
  select(Engagement.Activity, all_of(as.character(year_cols))) %>%
  arrange(Engagement.Activity)

# add Total row
total_row <- n_activity_by_year %>%
  summarise(
    Engagement.Activity = "Total in Year",
    across(where(is.numeric), sum)
  )

n_activity_by_year <- bind_rows(n_activity_by_year, total_row)

kable(
```
